name: GO FOR A WALK (23P5)
description:
🐕❤️

Spend time with your dog, build up the trust and unlock all the minigames.
Customize your friend to make him your own.

Enjoy causal, skillbased gameplay and try to beat the world in the leaderboards.

.. but most of all, have fun playing this little gem.

Features:

💩 skillbased, competitive gameplay
💩 your cute dog
💩 unlock a lot of things
💩 customize your own dog

🐕❤️
